text: I was In the neighbourhood and looking for something quick and delicious, so I took a chance and headed into Delight Food (formally Ernie's). After conquering the chicken roti, I realized I found a gem. It was delicious, the chicken and potatoes were full of flavour and the wrap was fresh and soft. It looks to be a family run business and all behind the counter had smilesX on their faces. Tucked into a strip mall, seek it out for some good eats. Next up, I'll try the jerk chicken!
Was working near by and the smell drew me in. Friendly staff and enjoyed my oxtail meal. Will definitely be going back and try some other items.
Their Food is delicious. I eat here atleast once a month. Stew chicken is my favourite. Very underrated Caribbean restaurant
